entry.title: Revisiting the BIPS process, a proposal
entry.summary: In a 2013 forum post, Luke-Jr and Jean-Paul Kogelman discuss whether the Bitcoin protocol specification page should be codified into BIPs. Luke-Jr notes that while it wouldn't hurt to do so, the page would likely need a modular and formal rewrite. A user named Martin chimes in, expressing frustration with the lack of a comprehensive protocol specification for Bitcoin and offering to help create one if necessary. Martin had previously searched for the protocol spec and found two wiki pages that resembled implementation notes rather than a cohesive document.
